name: Hack n' Stealth
description:
Play a secret agent and a hacker and try to infiltrate a highly guarder building, full of mafia members! 

Your mission is to steal top secret documents about a new drug, in order to produce it and take control of the population!

My roles : Producer, game designer, lighting artist, QA

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Student project.  2 months.  Online co-op.

WARNING: You must be two players on two different computers to enjoy this game. WARING 2: The game is a little buggy, we are aware of that, unfortunately we didn't have the time to fix everything before the dead line.
